mapper.insert: insert into gamelist_record (record_assortment, record_nickname, record_twop, record_threep, record_onep, record_foul, record_assist, record_steal, record_block, record_turnover, record_totalp, record_quarter) value( #{record_assortment}, #{record_nickname}, #{record_twop}, #{record_threep}, #{record_onep}, #{record_foul}, #{record_assist}, #{record_steal}, #{record_block}, #{record_turnover}, #{record_totalp}, #{record_quarter} )
mapper.select: select record_date, record_quarter ,count(record_nickname) as peoplen from gamelist_record group by record_quarter, record_date order by record_date, record_quarter limit #{index}, 10

select record_assortment, record_nickname, record_twop, record_threep, record_onep, record_foul, record_assist, record_steal, record_block, record_turnover, record_totalp, record_quarter from gamelist_record where date_format(record_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') = #{record_date} and record_quarter = #{record_quarter} order by record_assortment desc
select record_nickname, record_date, record_quarter from gamelist_record where record_nickname = #{character_nickname} order by record_date, record_quarter
